pkgmetadata.longdescription: AmfiTrack extensions for the [Amfiprot](https://pypi.org/project/amfiprot/) package.# InstallationInstall (or update) with `pip`:```shellpip install -U amfiprot-amfitrack```# Usage exampleInstead of creating a generic `amfiprot.Device`, create an `amfitrack.Device` to get access to AmfiTrack specific functionality and payload interpretation:```pythonimport amfiprotimport amfiprot_amfitrack as amfitrackVENDOR_ID = 0xC17PRODUCT_ID = 0xD12if __name__ == "__main__": conn = amfiprot.UsbConnection(VENDOR_ID, PRODUCT_ID) nodes = conn.find_nodes() print(f"Found {len(nodes)} node(s).") for node in nodes: print(f"[{node.tx_id}] {node.name}") dev = amfitrack.Device(nodes[0]) conn.start() cfg = dev.config.read_all() dev.calibrate() while True: if dev.packet_available(): packet = dev.get_packet() if type(packet.payload) == amfitrack.payload.RawBFieldPayload: payload: amfitrack.payload.RawBFieldPayload = packet.payload print(payload.b_field)```
